body.p: The Abstract step describes the third stage of the abstract generation process. AG adjusts pin shapes, performs blockage modeling, creates sites, and calculates overlap layers.

ul.li:

This opens the Running step Abstract form.
There are six tabs on the form: Adjust, Blockage, Density, Fracture, Site, and Overlap.
Select the options on this form, and then click Run.
